history.proof: srun best use: Nat.lt_le_trans unfold: is_at_least_n_stream.

original: intros h n m Hnm H. revert n Hnm. induction m using Nat.strong_left_induction. intros n Hnm H_lt. assert (Hcase: n = m \/ n < m) by lia. destruct Hcase as [-> | Hlt]. - apply H_lt. - apply IHm with (n := n); auto. intros n' Hn'. apply H_lt. lia.
